Front End Developer at Left Field Labs
March 6, 2017, Piper worked with Gleb in different groups

Gleb is a great representation of LFL. His humor, intelligence, and casual tone made me feel instantly comfortable throughout the interview process, allowing me to actually convey my skills. When chatting about the job description, I never felt that he was just searching for jargon or buzz words, but actually interested in the work that I do. He was also very accommodating with scheduling calls and interviews around my previous full time job, which helped the process tremendously. It was so nice to work with a recruiter with both a knowledge of the industry and the ability asses if a candidate will be a good fit for the company. We have a great team that Gleb has helped put together because of this. I’m so glad he reached out to me, and that I get to listen to him sing to himself every day.

I came to work at Left Field Labs, in a large part because of Gleb.  I was impressed by how he sold the company to me, his efforts to work within the constraints of my timeline and how he went to bat for me when the time came. Gleb is an incredible first impression, and his easy going demeanor, winning personality, and the desire to help others achieve their career goals leaves a lasting one as well.  I look forward to working with him in the future, as he continues to knock it out of the park.

October 28, 2016, Fernando worked with Gleb in different groups

Gleb has a natural gift for recognizing talent in others, and the determination to bring someone to his side. He has all the qualities a great Technical Recruiter requires, he is attentive, truly listens to what your concerns are, understands boundaries and is polite and considerate. He has the technical knowledge required to quickly assess a candidate's level, and the charisma necessary to communicate their importance to the company, and the future they can build together. He truly has a passion for finding the best people in their field and seeking them out without imposing. I recommend Gleb as Lead Technical Recruiter wholeheartedly.

Stephanie Arnow
Voice Over Actor, Mommy Blogger, Podcast Advertising Operations
October 26, 2016, Stephanie worked with Gleb in different groups

Gleb made my experience coming to LFL a dream. Shortly after I was "downsized"  from my last company, I accepted a connection request from Gleb and immediately got to work on getting to know him better. He is not only kind and funny, he was intuitive, thoughtful and really understands the process of finding/hiring new talent AND understands the industry we're in, which makes a world of difference. Too many times, recruiters don't really *get* the work that the people they're recruiting for do. He gets it. Gleb also asked me some of the best questions I've had on a first interview and none of the typical (read, lame) ones (i.e., never asked me to self-identify my weaknesses). He was also very thorough in setting my expectations at Left Field and quick in the hiring process. I can't say enough nice things about Gleb and I hope to be singing his praises for a long, long time. :)

Producer at Left Field Labs
October 26, 2016, Rob Scott worked with Gleb in different groups

I had a great experience with Gleb. He recruited me for a position at a digital creative agency in Venice and was very honest and attentive throughout the entire process. He represented the company extremely well and didn't come off like a salesman trying to convince me that this was the right decision for me. When I had questions during the contract negotiation, he was able to get the information and reply back extremely fast. He's also a really personable guy and never left me with a cold "corporate recruiter" feeling. I've dealt with a lot of recruiters in my time and very few stand out. Gleb is one of the good guys.

summary: I create an exceptional candidate experience and discover the right talent for my client's projects. I'm a full cycle recruiter, handling everything including kick-off meetings with hiring managers, writing/editing job descriptions, sourcing qualified candidates, email reach-out campaigns, phone screens, scheduling all interviews, executing NDA's, vendor agreements, and offer letters, and successfully closing candidates. I also manage 3rd party recruiters. You can reach me at gleb@leftfieldlabs.com
